document.discussion_title: YMCA holds second planning meeting here
document.topic_text: YMCA holds second planning meeting here filed under News by Les High reported 17 hours ago K.C. Cousineau, Resource Director of North Carolina YMCAs, speaks during a meeting Wednesday as the county continues to explore a potential relationship to build a YMCA branch affiliated with the Wilmington chapter here. Five groups teamed up to present ideas on four topics, ranging from living healthier to bringing families together.
document.post: YMCA holds second planning meeting here filed under News by Les High reported 17 hours ago K.C. Cousineau, Resource Director of North Carolina YMCAs, speaks during a meeting Wednesday as the county continues to explore a potential relationship to build a YMCA branch affiliated with the Wilmington chapter here. Five groups teamed up to present ideas on four topics, ranging from living healthier to bringing families together.
